content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the `google` command with the argument of "best places to visit in Europe". The command returned a list of URLs containing information on the best places to visit in Europe.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result')]
"""
